rows.label: qst701701_msg0001
rows.name:
...You're quite something. There's not
a day I don't hear your name now. Seeing
your skills, I have a request...

rows.label: qst701701_msg0002
rows.name:
I'm looking for the bastard who
killed my sister. Lend me a hand.
I know he's hiding in Iira.

rows.label: qst701701_msg0003
rows.name:
His alias is the "Silent Specter." He's the
leader of an organization called the Bloody
Lobsters. I don't know anything else.

rows.label: qst701701_msg0004
rows.name:
For the past year, I've searched every corner of
Iira, but I haven't found a single clue or trace...
So I want to borrow your connections and hands.

rows.label: qst701701_msg0005
rows.name:
Help me gather information. Just
ask the people who have recently
come to Iira if they know anything.

rows.label: qst701701_msg0006
rows.name:
...And one more thing. If you find
anything that leads to him, don't act
on your own. Be sure to let me know.

rows.label: qst701701_msg0007
rows.name:
I will be the one to deal
with him. Absolutely.

rows.label: qst701701_msg0101
rows.name:
The bastard who killed my sister is the leader
of an organization called the Bloody Lobsters,
and he has the nickname "Silent Specter."

rows.label: qst701701_msg0102
rows.name:
Help me gather information. Just
ask the people who have recently
come to Iira if they know anything.

rows.label: qst701701_msg0103
rows.name:
...And one more thing. If you find
anything that leads to him, don't act
on your own. Be sure to let me know.

rows.label: qst701701_msg0104
rows.name:
I will be the one to deal
with him. Absolutely.
